attributes.additional_details:
Dr sir/mam
I may only be 10, but I have a big dream, to band smoking! I realise a lot of people say this to you but I hate smoking! How many times have you walked into a bar /pub/ resraunt and smelt the stink of cigarettes?
Not only does it put the planet at risk, but also our lives! People say cigarettes are not drugs, but those people are completly wrong! If we have the power to band cigarettes then what are we waiting for?
